TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListItem extends System.Windows.Documents.TextElement

summary.span: 一个流内容元素，表示有序或无序的 中的一个特定内容项。

span.span: A flow content element that represents a particular content item in an ordered or unordered .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为子内容强制实施强内容模型。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 有关内容模型的详细信息，请参阅 [TextElement 内容模型概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview) 。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview) for more information about the content model. 元素必须包含在 元素中。 elements must be contained by a element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用定义 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 。The following example shows how to define a using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ListSnippets#_ListXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_listxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式创建和填充 。The following example shows how to create and populate a programmatically. [!code-csharp[ListSnippets#_List_Props](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_list_props)] [!code-vb[ListSnippets#_List_Props](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_list_props)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照：有序列表](~/add/media/ordered-list.png "屏幕快照：有序列表")![Screenshot: Ordered list](~/add/media/ordered-list.png "Screenshot: Ordered list") 下面的示例演示如何 使用在列表中定义嵌套 (列表) [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 。The following example shows how to define a nested (lists within lists) using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ListSnippets#_NestedListXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_nestedlistxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![嵌套列表](~/add/media/flow-nested-list-example.png "嵌套列表")![Nested list](~/add/media/flow-nested-list-example.png "Nested list")

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness BorderThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.BorderThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边框粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the border thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，指定要应用的边框量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of border to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，的值等效于的 `"10"` 值 `"10,10,10,10"` 。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序值的字符串表示形式， 对应于 "左"、"上"、"右" 和 "下"，按此顺序排列。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 会导致 "内容" 左侧有5个像素的边框，内容的上边为10个像素，内容右侧有15个像素的边框，内容的下方有20个像素的边框。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of border to the left of content, 10 pixels of border above content, 15 pixels of border to the right of content, and 20 pixels of border below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如， `"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供均匀的边框。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform border of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_BordersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_bordersxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照：蓝色、1/1/4 的边框](~/add/media/block-borders.png "屏幕快照：Block 周围 1/4 英寸的蓝色边框")![Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block](~/add/media/block-borders.png "Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block") 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_borders)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_borders)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };
member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 元素中内容流的相对方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 值之一，指定相对流动方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 设置此属性将导致 元素的内容重新沿指示的方向流动。Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction. 内容的流动方向通常对应于所表示语言的原始流方向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语是自然从右到左的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英语、德语和俄语是自然从左至右流动的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值不会自动更改，与操作系统所使用的语言相匹配。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果需要使用与默认值不同的值 ，则必须自行指定。If you need to use a different value than the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LineHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 每个行的高度范围为 0.0034 到 160000，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The height of each line in device independent pixels with a value range of 0.0034 to 160000.

value.span: 值 (等效于属性值 "Auto" ) 导致自动根据当前的字体特征确定行高。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此 值不会更改关联文本的高度; 而是更改包含文本的行的高度。Changing the value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 除了此属性，中的行布局还 受其属性的影响 。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 范围内的值的字符串表示形式 `0.0034` `160000` 。String representation of a value in the range `0.0034` to `160000`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的 *双精度* 值， (只不过 `Auto`) 后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 和 `pt` 。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动Auto 使行高由当前字体特征自动确定。Causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 等效于的属性值 。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_lineheightxaml)] 下图显示了上一个示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the previous example renders. ![屏幕快照：FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "屏幕快照：FlowDocument LineHeight")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight") 下图显示了在的默认设置下，该示例的呈现方式 = 。The following figure shows how the same example renders with the default setting of =. ![屏幕快照：FlowDocument LineHeight 默认值](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "屏幕快照：FlowDocument LineHeight 默认值")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default") 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_lineheight)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_lineheight)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness Margin { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.Margin : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边距粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，指定要应用的边距量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of margin to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是位于元素的内容区域外、元素内容区域边缘和父元素边缘之间的缓冲空间。 is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. 与相对 应的是，它是位于元素的内容区域内部、元素的内容和元素的内部边缘之间的缓冲空间。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，的值等效于的 `"10"` 值 `"10,10,10,10"` 。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序值的字符串表示形式， 对应于 "左"、"上"、"右" 和 "下"，按此顺序排列。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 会使内容的左侧有5个像素的边距，内容的上方边距为10个像素，内容右侧有15个像素的边距，内容的下方有20个像素的边距。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of margin to the left of content, 10 pixels of margin above content, 15 pixels of margin to the right of content, and 20 pixels of margin below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如， `"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供1英寸的统一边距。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform margin of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPaddingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_marginpaddingxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. 使用夸大的厚度和颜色进行说明。Exaggerated thicknesses and colors are used for illustration. ![屏幕快照：具有填充和边距的段落](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "屏幕快照：具有填充和边距的段落")![Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins") 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_marginpadding)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_marginpadding)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness Padding { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.Padding : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的填充厚度。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，它指定要应用的填充量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是位于元素的内容区域内部、元素的内容和元素的内部边缘之间的缓冲空间。 is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. 与相对 应的是，它是位于元素内容区域外、元素内容区域边缘和父元素边缘之间的缓冲空间。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，的值等效于的 `"10"` 值 `"10,10,10,10"` 。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序值的字符串表示形式， 对应于 "左"、"上"、"右" 和 "下"，按此顺序排列。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 将在内容左侧填充5个像素，在内容右侧填充10个像素，在内容右侧填充15个像素，在内容的下方填充20个像素。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如， `"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供1英寸的统一填充。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SiblingListItems As ListItemCollection

summary.span: 获取包含 元素的 ，这些元素是当前 元素的同级元素。

span.span: Gets a that contains the elements that are siblings of the current element.

value.span: 一个包含子级 元素的 ，这些元素直接由当前 元素的父级承载；如果当前 元素无父级，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the child elements that are directly hosted by the parent of the current element, or if the current element has no parent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的包含 通过其访问集合的元素; 即，拥有此属性的元素被视为其自己的同级，目的是为了生成同级的集合。The returned by this property includes the element through which the collection is accessed; that is, the element that owns this property is considered to be its own sibling for the purposes of generating the collection of siblings.

value.span: 默认为 。
